home.hero.subtitle: The most secure way to share files. End-to-end encrypted, peer-to-peer, and protected against quantum computers.
home.hero.subtitleLong: Military-grade post-quantum encrypted file transfer. No accounts, no size limits, completely private. Your files never touch our servers.
home.why.title: File sharing should be simple, fast, and private.
home.why.text: Most services store your files on their servers, require accounts, and have arbitrary limits. Tallow connects you directly - your files never touch our servers. Zero knowledge, zero compromise.
home.features.title: Built for privacy.
home.features.fast.title: Lightning Fast
home.features.fast.desc: Direct P2P transfers at your network's maximum speed. No middleman, no throttling.
home.features.encrypted.title: End-to-End Encrypted
home.features.encrypted.desc: AES-256-GCM encryption before files leave your device. Zero knowledge architecture.
home.features.anywhere.title: Works Anywhere
home.features.anywhere.desc: Local WiFi or across the internet. NAT traversal handles complexity automatically.
home.features.friends.title: Friends List
home.features.friends.desc: Quick access to people you share with often
home.features.folders.title: Folder Support
home.features.folders.desc: Send entire directories with structure intact. Preserves hierarchy and metadata.
home.features.text.title: Text & Code
home.features.pqc.title: Post-Quantum Security
home.features.pqc.desc: ML-KEM-768 encryption protects against quantum computer attacks. Future-proof security.
home.features.privacy.title: Traffic Obfuscation
home.features.privacy.desc: Onion routing and padding protect your identity and transfer patterns.
home.features.group.title: Group Transfer
home.features.group.desc: Send files to multiple recipients simultaneously with individual encryption keys.
home.features.screen.title: Screen Sharing
home.features.screen.desc: Share your screen up to 4K with audio. End-to-end encrypted.
home.features.chat.title: Encrypted Chat
home.features.chat.desc: Real-time messaging with end-to-end encryption during transfers.
home.features.tor.title: VPN/Tor Optimized
home.features.tor.desc: Auto-detect and optimize for anonymous networks and privacy tools.
home.features.resumable.title: Resumable Transfers
home.features.resumable.desc: Interrupted transfers resume automatically from where they left off.
home.features.offline.title: Offline Mode
home.features.offline.desc: Works without internet on local networks. Full PWA support.
home.features.voice.title: Voice Commands
home.features.voice.desc: Hands-free control for accessibility and convenience.
home.features.i18n.title: 22 Languages
home.features.i18n.desc: Full internationalization with RTL support. Switch languages instantly.
home.howItWorks.title: Three steps to secure transfers
home.howItWorks.subtitle: No sign-ups, no subscriptions, no catches. Just secure, private file transfers in seconds.
home.howItWorks.step1.title: Open Tallow
home.howItWorks.step1.desc: No sign-up needed. Just open the app in your browser and you're ready to go. Works on any device.
home.howItWorks.step2.title: Connect Devices
home.howItWorks.step2.desc: Scan a QR code, enter a code, or discover devices on your local network. Connection is instant and encrypted.
home.howItWorks.step3.title: Transfer Securely
home.howItWorks.step3.desc: Drag and drop your files. They're encrypted on your device and sent directly to the recipient. No cloud involved.
home.security.title: Security you can trust.
home.security.subtitle: Built on cutting-edge cryptographic standards. Audited, open-source, and designed to protect your data against current and future threats.
home.security.text: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device. We never see, store, or access anything you transfer.
home.connection.title: Choose Your Connection
home.connection.local.title: Local Network
home.connection.local.desc: Maximum speed transfers over your local WiFi. Perfect for offices and home networks.
home.connection.internet.title: Internet P2P
home.connection.internet.desc: Send files to anyone, anywhere in the world. NAT traversal handles the complexity.
home.cta.title: Ready to share files
home.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust Tallow for their most sensitive files. No sign-up required.
home.cta.subtitleAlt: Free and open source. No account required. Start transferring in seconds.
home.cta.joinUsers: Join thousands of users who trust Tallow for their private file transfers.
